publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4607 Anne McLaughlin: Castlemilk Community Champions—That the Parliament congratulates Castlemilk Pensioners’ Action Centre on winning the Community Champion Team Award in recognition of its work serving 500 pensioners from the local area; notes that the centre has been part of the community for over 20 years and serves up to 100 meals each day as well as providing activities and day trips to users, and wishes continued success and recognition for its excellent work in the future. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*, Jamie McGrigor*, Rob Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Aileen Campbell*
S3M-4607 Castlemilk Community Champions (lodged on 16 July 2009) Kenneth Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-4607 Castlemilk Community Champions (lodged on 16 July 2009) Angela Constance*
